TextView.android:text:
Welcome to ArduioScope

 Follow these steps to use this app
 1. Write the url of the data server(wifi module ip address) on the text area at the bottom.
 N.B don't forget to use http:// at the beginning of the ip add

2. Press the connect button to connect to the url
 3. After connection is successfully created press the Draw button to get the signal
 4. Press the Screen shot button to take snap shot of the current signal image
 5. The image will be stored in the phone storage with a directory name of Arduino_Scope_Pictures and a file name of now and a number
